1.descricao: Char deals 4 damage to target creature or player and 2 damage to you.
1.texto: If you've never choked on the embers of your own spell, you aren't casting it hard enough.

2.descricao:
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

{T}: Kamahl, Pit Fighter deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
2.texto: In times when freedom seems lost, great souls arise to reclaim it.

regras.texto: The Legend rule only applies to two legendary permanents with identical names. If the names are different, even if they depict the same character, the rule does not apply.
